EmailTemplate.subject: Share your Cable Industry insight for charity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} Share your Cable Industry insight for charity Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
In December you should have received an email from the Nokia Customer Marketing team with an invite to participate in a survey about technology solutions for Cable Operators. If you have responded, many thanks! If not, there is still time and we value your insight.
The survey is being conducted by an independent third party on behalf of Nokia and should take around 10 minutes. All opinions you offer will remain anonymous and confidential. The results will be used, in aggregate, to improve Nokia’s products and services and the way we work with our customers overall.
In return for your participation, a donation of $30 (or the equivalent in local currency) will be made to a charity that you will be able to select on completion of the survey. The charities you can choose from are UNICEF (United Nations Children’s Fund), Médecins Sans Frontières (Doctors Without Borders), WWF (World Wildlife Fund), and OXFAM (Famine Relief).
Please CLICK HERE <[[{{lead.mkto_Temp String:default=edit me}}]]> to take the survey now.
Thank you in advance for your participation. We value your opinion.
Jay Fausch Head of Cable Customer Marketing https://twitter.com/JayFausch <[[https://twitter.com/JayFausch]]>
If you would prefer to not take part in the research please email news.networks@nokia.com <[[mailto:news.networks@nokia.com]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
